item2: January 28, 2021 October 21, 2022, announced Board Directors (“Board”) approved share repurchase authorizations under repurchase program $6.0 billion, which fully utilized first quarter 2025, $3.0 billion, respectively. During year date 2025, used $998 million cash repurchase 4.5 million shares common stock under share repurchase program. October 3, 2025, $2.4 billion remaining unused authorization under repurchase program. During year date 2024, used $512 million cash repurchase 2.3 million shares common stock under share repurchase program.
